name: Airpods Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality AAC audio that offers immersive listening experience and built-in microphone that allows you to take calls while working

name: iPhone 11 Pro 256GB Memory
description: Introducing the iPhone 11 Pro. A transformative triple-camera system that adds tons of capability without complexity.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: Experience the ultimate in smartphone technology with the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra. It features a stunning display, powerful performance, and a versatile camera system.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: Immerse yourself in the world of gaming with the Sony PlayStation 5. Enjoy stunning graphics, fast loading times, and a wide range of games to choose from.

name: Dell XPS 15 Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 15 is a powerful and sleek laptop that offers exceptional performance for both work and entertainment. It features a stunning display, fast processor, and ample storage space.

name: Amazon Echo (4th Generation)
description: The Amazon Echo is a smart speaker that combines premium sound with a built-in voice assistant. It can play music, control smart home devices, and provide information with just your voice.

name: GoPro HERO9 Black
description: Capture stunning 5K videos and high-resolution photos with the GoPro HERO9 Black. It's rugged, waterproof, and packed with advanced features for capturing your adventures.

name: Nintendo Switch
description: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile gaming console that allows you to play games at home or on the go. It offers a wide range of games and supports multiplayer gaming.

name: Fitbit Versa 3
description: Track your fitness and stay connected with the Fitbit Versa 3. It features heart rate monitoring, built-in GPS, sleep tracking, and smart notifications for calls and messages.

name: Canon EOS Rebel T7i DSLR Camera
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the Canon EOS Rebel T7i DSLR Camera. It features a 24.2-megapixel sensor, fast autofocus, and a vari-angle touchscreen for easy shooting.
